# efutils

<!-- badges: start -->
![Dev Version](https://img.shields.io/badge/github-0.0.1-blue.svg)
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of efutils is to provide Utility functions used by [Exploring Finance](https://exploringfinance.github.io/).

## Installation

This will not be submitted to CRAN. Install the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("exploringfinance/efutils")
```
## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(efutils)
## basic example code

ef_conv_perc(.1234)

ef_date_diff('2020-01-01','2020-12-31',bus_only = TRUE)

ef_if.na(NA,3)

```
